function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Proliferation of digitally connected iot devices in smart cities can lead to an increased risk of contagious diseases spreading through these devices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data harvesting from citizens, devices, and assets in smart cities can lead to privacy and security risks, including the potential exposure of sensitive personal information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consistency in the definition of ’smart cities’ can lead to uncertainty and confusion in the implementation of smart city technologies and strategies, potentially hindering effective governance and urban development.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased connectivity and communication may lead to faster propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased connectivity and interaction in smart cities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of technological infrastructure for internet connectivity","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on private corporations for smart city development","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased population density in urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on new technologies and digital platforms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited community engagement and participation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid technological innovation in response to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance and monitoring by corporations and governance entities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global cooperation and governance challenges in the face of corporate influence","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relocalised centres and decentralized work environments may lead to increased population density in these areas, posing a risk of contagion and rapid disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot platforms and smart devices for data connectivity creates a potential security risk, as these systems are vulnerable to cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of non-car movements and micro-mobility may lead to challenges in maintaining hygiene and sanitation in public transportation systems, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized framework for iot device implementation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monopolistic introduction of unique iot devices by corporations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expensive infrastructure investment due to multiple device platforms","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unavailability of supportive technological infrastructure, including network connectivity","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High implementation costs leading to abandonment or refocusing of the smart city pursuit","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited wireless communication leading to expensive infrastructural costs","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited network and database setups for smart cities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on skewed data for decision-making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on quality network for smart city sustainability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of 6g technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of wireless technology installation and application due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Major shift to at-home work and self-isolated society in developed countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased domestic internet use leading to potential spread of contagious diseases through shared devices and networks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Major decline in fixed office internet access leading to increased reliance on shared public wi-fi networks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of 5g and potential future transition to 6g increasing connectivity and data transfer speeds.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through increased interaction between iot devices and humans","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and resistance to iot-based data collection for healthcare monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on ai technology for health data analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased movement and interaction of people and wildlife as a result of optimized location awareness and autonomous transportation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telemedicine and remote healthcare services facilitated by 6g technology could result in potential cybersecurity vulnerabilities and data privacy risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of intelligent wearable devices iwd and remote healthcare technologies powered by 6g may lead to challenges in ensuring the accuracy and reliability of health data collected from individuals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to physical contact and use of paper-based identity systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable access to digital services and technologies, exacerbating urban inequalities and infrastructure issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on traditional behavioral aspects and lack of adoption of contactless technologies leading to continued risk of disease transmission and reduced pandemic containment efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to internet and digital solutions in least developed countries ldcs","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented interest and increase in wearable devices and smart body implants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive availability and utilization of data in urban environments through 6g technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through urban areas due to rapid population growth and increased global connectivity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to increased use of virtual reality technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical presence in real-time operations may lead to delayed or inadequate response to health and safety hazards","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obsolete hardware and software in the past may have lacked proper infection control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote operation and monitoring may lead to increased risk of contagion spread if proper health and safety measures are not implemented","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to fragile or toxic ores and chemicals can pose health risks in the absence of proper monitoring and control","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urban density and the use of digital replicas in smart cities may impact public health and safety","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
